column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: はぁ…"危なかった…
column4:
OK, that was enough mortal peril for
one day.

column3: 緊張感で おなか痛くなってきた…
column4:
Close calls like this get my stomach all
tied up in knots.

column3:
あやうく魔物の餌食になるところだったよ！
助けてくれてありがとう！
column4:
Those monsters were out for blood, and
if not for you, it would have been mine.
Thanks for the rescue!

column3:
あいたた…ゲルド族としてだらしなかったね…
私は魔物は苦手なんだよ
column4:
Owww... A Gerudo ought to have known
better than that. But I've never been
my best around monsters.

column3: 早く逃げな！"ガーディアンが来るよ！
column4:
Don't think—just run! There's a Guardian
on its way!

column3:
ハーイ ぼうや！
地図は持っているかい？
旅をするなら目的地をしっかり決めて
地図を頼りに移動することを ススメるよ
私は素敵なパートナー探しの旅に出る！
だからぼうやも がんばりな！
column4:
Hey, kid! Are you trying to get
someplace? Do you have a map?If you do, then it's good to set a goal to
reach and then check your map every
so often to get your bearings.
Take me, for instance—my goal is to find
a fine, strapping voe! Best of luck with
whatever your goal is, kid!

column3:
旅をするなら目的地をしっかり決めて
地図を頼りに移動することを ススメるよ
column4:
It's good to set a goal to reach and then
check your map every so often to get
your bearings.

column3:
私は南西のゲルド砂漠からアッカレ地方まで
パートナー探しの旅をしている
他の種族に出会えるのは とても刺激的で
新しい考え方に触れることも多いよ
ぼうやも世界を回って
刺激的な出会いをたくさん経験しような！
column4:
I've traveled from the Gerudo Desert in 
the southwest all the way here to Akkala
on my journey to find a partner.
The best parts of it have been getting to
meet all the peoples of the world and
hearing their thoughts and perspectives.
That's my advice to you: don't be shy
with the people you meet, no matter
what they look like!

column3:
私は南西のゲルド砂漠からアッカレ地方まで
パートナー探しの旅を楽しんでる
他の種族に出会えるのは とても刺激的で
新しい考え方に触れることも多いよ
column4:
I've traveled from the Gerudo Desert in 
the southwest all the way here to Akkala
on my journey to find a partner.
The best parts of it have been getting to
meet all the peoples of the world and
hearing their thoughts and perspectives.

column3:
旅の途中で聞いた話だが…
ハイラル城の奥には珍しい矢があるらしい
ぼうやが腕を磨いて もし城に向かう日が来たら
珍しい矢のことを思い出しておくれ
column4:
Someone I met a while ago told me
about a rare set of arrows deep inside
Hyrule Castle.
It might be something to remember
if you ever find yourself exploring
the place.

column3:
ぼうやが腕を磨いて もし城に向かう日が来たら
城に珍しい矢が眠ることを思い出しておくれ
column4:
Remember to look for a rare set
of arrows if you ever find yourself
exploring the castle.

column3:
ぼうやは弓の腕はどうなんだい？

弓矢で魔物を倒す時は基本は頭を狙うこと
ガーディアンの場合は目を狙うといいぞ
ふだんから練習をこなすことで…
素敵な異性のハートを…
いやいや魔物を射止めることができるぞ
column4:
You any good with a bow, kid?If you can hit a mark, then try aiming for
heads with monsters and eyes with
Guardians.
Keep practicing your aim, and someday
you might even pierce the heart of—
monsters. I obviously meant monsters.

column3:
弓矢で魔物を倒す時は基本は頭を狙うこと
ガーディアンの場合は目を狙うといいぞ
column4:
When using a bow, you want to aim for
the head with monsters and the eyes
with Guardians.

column3:
ハーイ ぼうや！
ぼうやは巨大な敵に遭遇したことはあるかい？
戦うのか！逃げるのか！
判断に迷ったら武器の状態で決めるといい
戦闘中に矢が尽きたり武器が壊れたりしたら…
それはもう悲惨なことになるからな
column4:
Hey, kid! I'm sure you've fought your
share of the riffraff, but have you ever
run up against the really big ones?
Stand and fight? Cut and run? It all
depends on what condition your
weapons are in, really.
If your quiver runs dry and all your
weapons break in the middle of a fight...
Well, I hope you have a backup plan.

column3:
戦うのか！逃げるのか！
判断に迷ったら武器の状態で決めるといい
戦闘中に矢が尽きたり武器が壊れたりしたら…
それはもう悲惨なことになるからな
column4:
Stand and fight? Cut and run? It all
depends on what condition your
weapons are in, really.
If your quiver runs dry and all your
weapons break in the middle of a fight...
Well, I hope you have a backup plan.

column3: ハイリア人はいいね…
column4: Hylians are good folk...

column3: ゴロン族はいいね…
column4: Gorons are hardy folk...

column3: 旅人はいいね…
column4: Travelers are so curious.

column3: 料理人はいいね…
column4: Cooks are the best folk.

column3: 雨かぁ…
column4: I'll never get used to rain.

column3:
私は はるか南西のゲルド砂漠から
ヴォーイハントの旅でやってきたんだ
どうせなら よりどりみどりがいいと思って
このアッカレ地方を選んだのさ
column4:
I came all the way out from the
Gerudo Desert, far to the southwest,
on my voe hunt.
I figured the other vai will tire out and
stick close to home. Out here in Akkala,
the field should be wide open.

column3:
心は晴れてるから この雨のこと
素敵な演出として受け入れられるよ
column4:
Everything is so different in the outside
world. I hear your folk complain about
the rain often, but I never get tired of it.

column3:
雨は熱くなりすぎた想いを冷ましてくれる
私にはありがたい
column4:
The rain helps cool me off when I get
too flushed from staring at voe.

column3:
ハーイ ぼうや！
マモノ屋を知ってるかい？
地図があるなら見てみたらいい
ドクロに見える池が北の方にあるだろう？
夜に その池に行けば
マモノ屋と呼ばれる何者かに会えるらしい
column4:
Hey, kid! Ever hear of a thing called
Fang and Bone?Check your map for a pond in the north
that looks like a skull. If it's not on there
yet, you'll know it when you see it.
That pond at night is where you'll run
into Fang and Bone, if you've got the
stomach for it.

column3:
地図があるなら見てみたらいい
ドクロに見える池が北の方にあるだろう？
夜に その池に行けば
マモノ屋と呼ばれる何者かに会えるらしい
column4:
Check your map for a pond in the north
that looks like a skull. If it's not on there
yet, you'll know it when you see it.
That pond at night is where you'll run
into Fang and Bone, if you've got the
stomach for it.

column3:
ハーイ！ハイリア人のぼうや！

他にも ゾーラ ゴロン ゲルド リト…
アッカレには さまざまな種族との出会いがある
ぼうやが大地の冒険家なら
私は恋の冒険家と名乗ってみたい
もちろん ぼうやは私には若すぎる
そこについては安心なさいな
column4:
You there! Hylian kid! It's nice to meet
you. Out here in Akkala, we have all
sorts: Zora, Goron, Rito, you name it.
Time was, we didn't mix much, but
things change. And I'm glad they have!Some people travel the world for glory,
for money, for thrills... But me, I do it
for love.Easy there, though, kid. You're way too
young for me.

column3:
ハイリア ゾーラ ゴロン ゲルド リト…
アッカレには さまざまな種族との出会いがある
ぼうやが大地の冒険家なら
私は恋の冒険家と名乗ってみたい…
column4:
Out here in Akkala, we have all sorts:
Zora, Goron, Rito, you name it.

Some people travel the world for glory,
for money, for thrills... But me, I do it
for love.

column3:
ハーイ ぼうや！

矢の種類と数ばかりじゃなくて
弓の方も ときどきチェックしているかい？
いざって時に バキッなんてことがないように
なるべく丈夫な弓を蓄えておくように
私の場合は恋の矢を撃つ弓が折れないように
つまり心が折れないようにしてる…
column4:
Hey, kid! I'm sure you know by now that
your quiver runs dry quick, but do you
remember to keep an eye on your bow?
It's best to keep a sturdy backup or two,
just in case the one you're using snaps
at the worst possible moment.
I keep my most important weapon well-
oiled and tightly strung. Otherwise, how
will I ever pierce anyone's heart?

column3:
いざって時に バキッなんてことがないように
なるべく丈夫な弓を蓄えておくようにな
column4:
It's best to keep a sturdy backup bow or
two, just in case the one you're using
snaps at the worst possible moment.

column3:
ハーイ ぼうや！

弓ばかり良いものを持っていても
実際に敵に飛んでいくのは矢の方だからな？
恋のチャンスと戦いのピンチは
いつだって突然やってくるもの…
いざというとき矢が無いなんてことのないよう
本数は多めにあったほうがいいな
column4:
Hey, kid! Even the best bow is useless
if your quiver runs dry, right? I mean,
what else are you going to do with it?
Life has a funny way of throwing you
for a loop, and it's not always as nice
as bumping into a cutie out of nowhere.
Make sure you stock up on arrows before
something bumps into you. Get me?

column3:
恋のチャンスと戦いのピンチは
いつだって突然やってくるもの…
いざというとき矢が無いなんてことのないよう
本数は多めにあったほうがいいな
column4:
Life has a funny way of throwing you
for a loop, and it's not always as nice
as bumping into a cutie out of nowhere.
Make sure you stock up on arrows before
something bumps into you. Get me?

column3:
やあ ヴォーイ！

ヴォーイというか
私にとってはまだ ぼうやね
この街道を行き来する ヴォーイたちは
すべてが私の恋の的なのさ
種族も年齢もさまざまで
目移りがすごくて挙動不審な私ではあるが…
column4:
Hey, kid. Yeah, I know you're a voe, but you're
still a kid to me.I size up every voe coming and going
down the road for eligibility.They're different ages, sizes, sometimes
even races, so it's hard to make a call.
I probably look like a creep to them...

column3:
この街道を行き来する ヴォーイたちは
すべてが私の恋の的なのさ
種族も年齢もさまざまで
目移りがすごくて挙動不審な私ではあるが…
column4:
I size up every voe coming and going
down the road for eligibility.They're different ages, sizes, sometimes
even races, so it's hard to make a call.
I probably look like a creep to them...

column3:
ぼうやのおかげで助かったよ！
ありがとう！
column4: Thanks for stepping in, kid. I owe you!

column3:
ぼうや意外と強いんだね！
おかげで助かったよ！
column4:
I didn't think you had it in you, kid,
but you surprised me. Thanks!

column3:
ぼうやに助けてもらっちゃったね！
ほんとに！"助かったよ！
column4: Good going, kid! I mean that!

column3: ぼうや！助けてくれてありがとう！
column4: Hey, kid! I like your style!

column3: ぼうやは命の恩人だよ！
column4:
Whew. Kid, if I ever make it back to
Gerudo Town, the first glass of
Noble Pursuit is on me.

column3: ぼうやには頭が上がらないよ！
column4:
Next to you, kid, I might as well be a
sand-seal pup!

column3: サヴォッタ！
column4: Sav'otta!

column3: サヴァーク！
column4: Sav'aaq!

column3: サヴァサーバ！
column4: Sav'saaba!

column3: これは感謝の気持ちだよ！
column4:
I owe you big-time, and I always repay
my debts!
